Detailed Description

This class defines a class of Control Lyapunov Functions (CLFs) that use quadratic programming (QP)

◆ calcControl()

function colvec u = CLFQP.calcControl ( double  t,
colvec  x,
colvec  vfc,
colvec  gfc,
DynamicalSystem  plant,
struct  params,
SimLogger  logger 
)
inline

Computes the classical input-output feedback linearization control law for virtual constraints.

Parameters
tthe time instant
xthe states
vfcthe vector field f(x)
gfcthe vector field g(x)
plantthe continuous domain
paramsthe control parameters
loggerthe data logger object
Return values
uthe computed torque
